instructions.title: 📋 How to Use
instructions.step1: • Click 'Sync Data' button to fetch latest data from Google Sheets
instructions.step2: • After successful sync, the converted CSV file will be automatically downloaded
instructions.step3: • You can use this file to replace public/mario-kart-data.csv

warnings.title: ⚠️ Important Notes
warnings.warning1: • After syncing, manually replace the public/mario-kart-data.csv file
warnings.warning2: • We recommend backing up the existing CSV file before replacement
warnings.warning3: • If sync fails, check if Google Sheets is publicly accessible
warnings.warning4: • Data conversion may take time, please wait patiently
